articles.description: Follow action from Saturday's four games after Everton v Liverpool postponed, with Crystal Palace v Man City, Man Utd v Nottingham Forest coming up.

articles.title: Scottish Premiership - radio & text: BBC Sport

articles.title: Championship LIVE: Follow live text and latest scores across the Championship

articles.description: West Ham striker Michail Antonio has been involved in a road traffic accident, the Premier League club said.
articles.title: Michail Antonio: West Ham striker involved in 'road traffic accident'

articles.description: Lando Norris takes pole position at the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix ahead of team-mate Oscar Piastri as McLaren look set to clinch the constructors' title.
articles.title: Abu Dhabi Grand Prix: Lando Norris on pole with Lewis Hamilton 18th

articles.description: Exeter Chiefs lose 39-21 to a strong Sharks side in an eventful opening Investec Champions Cup pool match in Durban.
articles.title: Sharks 39-21 Exeter Chiefs: Premiership side lose Investec Champions Cup opener

articles.description: Jacob Bethell's serendipitous entry into Test cricket has left England with a decision to make, writes Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: England in New Zealand: Jacob Bethell's sliding doors moment means a decision is coming

articles.description: Manchester United co-owner Sir Jim Ratcliffe says the club has become "mediocre" and warned more "difficult and unpopular decisions" will be needed to get it back where he wants it to be.
articles.title: Manchester United: Sir Jim Ratcliffe says "difficult and unpopular decisions" needed at club

articles.description: Australia's bowlers back up a majestic century from Travis Head on his home ground to put themselves in a strong position to win the second Test against India.
articles.title: Australia vs India: Travis Head hits 140 before India crumble as hosts dominate day two
